title: Google Pixel 6 gets ‘Direct USB Access’ w/ upcoming June update, improves DAC support
content:
Google introduced a new pattern earlier this month with a beta program for the upcoming June Feature Drop for Pixel devices, and it seems that the update had some useful changes behind the scenes. Pixel 6 now supports “Direct USB Access,” which opens the door to better DAC support.

more…

The post Google Pixel 6 gets ‘Direct USB Access’ w/ upcoming June update, improves DAC support appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: An upcoming update for Google's Pixel 6 series will deliver better USB DAC support through "Direct USB Access." Here's what that means.
